name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs and cheese, then add cooked spaghetti and pancetta.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Healthy and delicious grilled salmon seasoned with herbs and lemon.
instructions: Preheat grill. Brush salmon with olive oil and season.
Serve with fresh herbs and lemon wedges.
